testimonalData.text: They have become our preferred choice for mediation services in large cases. Our matters require a lot of time and effort on the mediator’s part, and they did this. They are the best I have ever worked with.

testimonalData.text: Bob is an A-plus mediator. He is uniquely committed to finding solutions to complex cases, and does so by being exceptionally prepared, dogged in his follow-up, and fervent in his belief that all cases can be settled.

testimonalData.text: Both [of my mediations with Fairbank ADR] were settled only because of Bob’s persistence, clear understanding of the outcome determinative facts, and the simple expression of the legal challenges faced by both sides.
